mapper.select: SELECT i.`name` AS illustrator, COUNT(a.illustrator) AS post FROM illustrator AS i LEFT JOIN artwork AS a ON i.id = a.illustrator GROUP BY i.id ORDER BY post DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{limit}

SELECT i.`name` AS illustrator, COUNT(a.illustrator) AS post FROM illustrator AS i LEFT JOIN artwork AS a ON i.id = a.illustrator WHERE i.`name` IN ( SELECT DISTINCT i.`name` FROM `illustrator` AS i LEFT JOIN alias AS a ON (i.id = a.origin AND a.kind = 0) WHERE -- (kind = 0 OR kind IS NULL) (i.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR a.alias LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')) ) GROUP BY i.id ORDER BY post DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS c FROM illustrator

SELECT COUNT(*) AS c FROM `illustrator` AS i LEFT JOIN alias AS a ON (i.id = a.origin AND a.kind = 0) WHERE -- ( kind = 0 OR kind IS NULL ) (i.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR a.alias LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%'));

SELECT p.sequence, p.`name`, p.size, p.width, p.height, p.vOrH, p.uploadTime, p.thumbnailName, p.path FROM illustrator AS i, artwork AS a, pic AS p WHERE i.id = a.illustrator AND a.sequence = p.sequence AND i.`name` = #{illustrator} ORDER BY p.uploadTime DESC, p.`name` LIMIT #{skip}, #{limit}
